raw_comment: The new article gives us a better insight into why the southern states hit spring first and why we northern states hit last.  Temperates and many other factors affect which states hit spring first, we learned that from the new map.
ace_sentences: The new article gives us a better insight.
The new article explains why the southern states reach spring first.
The new article explains why the northern states reach spring last.
Temperature affects which states reach spring first.
Many other factors affect which states reach spring first.
We learned this from the new map.
